com.bandyer.android_sdk.intent.call

Class CallCapabilities

  • com.bandyer.android_sdk.intent.call.CallCapabilities

  • public class CallCapabilities

    This class represents call capabilities that can be used for a call.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CallCapabilities(boolean chat, boolean fileSharing, boolean screenSharing, boolean whiteboard) 
      CallCapabilities() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getChat()
      Boolean true to enable chat feature in call UI,
      boolean getFileSharing()
      Boolean true to enable fileSharing feature in call UI,
      boolean getScreenSharing()
      Boolean true to enable screenSharing feature in call UI,
      boolean getWhiteboard()
      Boolean true to enable whiteboard feature in call UI,
      void setChat(boolean p)
      Boolean true to enable chat feature in call UI,
      void setFileSharing(boolean p)
      Boolean true to enable fileSharing feature in call UI,
      void setScreenSharing(boolean p)
      Boolean true to enable screenSharing feature in call UI,
      void setWhiteboard(boolean p)
      Boolean true to enable whiteboard feature in call UI,
      CallCapabilities withChat()
      This function adds the chat capability to call UI.
      CallCapabilities withFileSharing()
      This function adds file sharing capability to call UI.
      CallCapabilities withScreenSharing()
      This function adds screen sharing capability to call UI.
      CallCapabilities withWhiteboard()
      This function adds whiteboard capability to call UI.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CallCapabilities

        public CallCapabilities(boolean chat,
                        boolean fileSharing,
                        boolean screenSharing,
                        boolean whiteboard)
        Parameters:
        chat - Boolean true to enable chat feature in call UI, false otherwise
        fileSharing - Boolean true to enable fileSharing feature in call UI, false otherwise
        screenSharing - Boolean true to enable screenSharing feature in call UI, false otherwise
        whiteboard - Boolean true to enable whiteboard feature in call UI, false otherwise
